author: Special Correspondent
text:
Dindigul District Consumer Disputes Redressal Forum imposed a fine of Rs. 12,000 on Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation for collection of excess fare from a teacher by the conductor of a bus.

Order

In an order passed on Tuesday, the forum chairman, Ayyappan, directed the General Manager, TNSTC, and the Depot Manager, Palani, to pay the fine, while disposing of a petition filed by Antony Joseph Selvan of Madathukulam in Tirupur district.

According to the petitioner, the conductor bus forced him to buy full tickets for two children, as it was festival season, for a trip from Madurai to Palani in 2014.
title: TNSTC fined for excess fare collection
